name: Trading Post Funds
desc: Funds designated for Trading Post transactions only. Strictly prohibited for unauthorized private use or reallocation.

name: Grain
desc: Essential for both survival and work. Wheat from the Town of Convallaria and fish from Waverun City sustain the lives of many across Iria.

name: Stone
desc: Material used to construct sturdy buildings that protect against dangers and the cold. The Mine Pit and Mornrays Castle, located near the mine, boast a high output of standard-grade stone.

name: Wheel
desc: Rough and bumpy roads often damage wheels, risking profit losses. Even the most frugal of merchants are willing to spend the extra coin to mitigate risk. Artisans from Windyvale Town and Mornrays Castle are adept at making more durable wheels.

name: Medicine
desc: Grants a temporary escape from death, though it's not infallible. Due to its scarcity—only the Advance Order of Waverun City has sufficient reserves—it's exchangeable for other items.

name: Salt
desc: The king of flavor. Adequate replenishment of it is vital after strenuous labor. With mining conditions returned to normal, the Mine Pit now holds the largest rock salt reserves.

name: Weaponry
desc: Diverse in form, yet with a singular purpose. Lately, a significant number of weapons seem to originate from Windyvale Town.

name: Rye Beer
desc: A famous specialty from the Town of Convallaria.

name: Spice
desc: Ingredients that enhance the flavor of food are in demand everywhere, but this can only be procured along the trade route to Elaman, such as in Windyvale Town and the Rabi'a Oasis.

name: Fur
desc: Sleek, water-resistant, and warm. Can only be procured in large quantities from the veteran hunters of the Vlder Tribes.

name: Luxite Explosive
desc: Powerful explosives useful in both warfare and production. They are only mass-produced in clandestine workshops located in Windyvale Town.

name: Pearl
desc: An adornment that comes from the ocean; it gleams after a little polish. Can only be purchased from the coastal city of Waverun.

name: Gems
desc: Rare minerals. Less dazzling than Luxite but capable of a radiant gleam with delicate polishing. The majority of gem artisans in Iria are based in Mornrays Castle.

name: Fortune Net
desc: A Vlder handwoven craft, widely believed to bring luck. Highly sought after by seafarers.

name: Snake Oil
desc: A specialty from the Rabi'a Oasis, rumored to be highly beneficial for health despite its horrible taste.

name: Luxite
desc: At the center of conflicting forces, this item wields influence over both the present and the future. The Advance Order in Waverun City has a high demand for it.

name: Tattered Chronicles
desc: Written in convoluted language, this book recounts the tales of the Radiant Son and Divine Light. Of little value to common folk, but coveted by those with particular intentions.

name: Imprisoned Tranquillo
desc: Locked in the cage, Tranquillo remains silent but appears at ease. We cannot keep him confined forever.

name: Local Herbs
desc: The rhizome of a common plant in Iria that helps blood circulation and eliminates stasis. It holds little local value but is highly sought after by the nobles of Elaman. Currently, we have no conventional means to sell it to Elaman unless we collaborate with Homa and try our luck at the gateway to the Rabi'a Oasis.

name: Mystery Crate
desc: A cargo hold that emits a vibe of "no questions asked," making one wonder whether it's become more low-profile or high-profile as a result.

name: Signet Ring
desc: The national signet of the State of Iria, the symbol of a fallen monarchy.

name: Elaman Premium Dye
desc: The luxurious color and aroma make it a lucrative commodity for the nobles of Mornrays Castle, generating a substantial amount of Trading Post Funds that can purchase nearly anything.
editor_name: 故事类货物_埃拉曼高级染料

name: Forest Core
desc: Unearthed by the Vlderian explorer Iggy from the depths of the cliff caves on the Vltar Mountain, the only known trait of this large Luxite so far is its invaluable worth.

name: Trojan Horse
desc: An old wooden horse, sized for child riders.

name: A Letter from Lutfi
desc: A modest and simple envelope containing heartfelt and eloquent content. How could anyone remain unaffected after reading it?
editor_name: 故事类货物_二王子的信

name: Dye Contract
desc: A permit for trading Elaman's special dyes—a coveted route for many merchants and one of the most lucrative trades on this continent.

name: Mystery Crate
desc: A cargo hold that appears even more low-profile than others, emitting a vibe of "no questions asked."
editor_name: 故事类货物_神秘货厢（军火）

name: Proof of Guilt Against the Papal States
desc: Proof of guilt against the Papal States (Temporary).
editor_name: 故事类货物_法皇国罪证

name: The Union's Conspiracy
desc: The Union's conspiracy (Temporary).
editor_name: 故事类货物_骑士团罪证
